name: Your Fingers Are Fireworks (Oculus Quest)
description:
Blowing up your fingers with fireworks has never been more fun or more safe! Happy New Year!

With the help of Oculus hand/finger tracking, your fingers ARE the fireworks. They are attached to the bloody stumps of your hands. 

  • Swiftly straighten a finger to light that finger's fuse, and launch that finger.
  • Each finger has a different type of firework.
  • Clap your hands a few times to restore lost fingers. The crowd will cheer.

REQUIRES Oculus/Meta Quest or Quest 2. Make sure the hand/finger tracking feature is enabled and put away your controllers. This game won't work without hand/finger tracking.

Made for 12 Days of Sketchmas 2022 game jam using the following themes: "celebration" (day 1) and "lights" (day 2).

Third Party Assets: Firework sounds from Universal SoundFX pack. Fuse2 sound by j1987 (CC0). Cordelina font by Samuel De Angelis. Star icon by Bellowen, Heart icon by Bellowen. Fish icon by melati.

PHOTOSENSITIVE SEIZURE WARNING: contains flashing lights!

This experience contains plenty of flashing lights that can be dangerous to any viewers with photosensitive epilepsy. If you feel that the experience will be in any way harmful or dangerous to you, then please exit the experience now. If any symptoms of nausea, headache, or dizziness begin to occur, then please exit the experience as soon as possible.
